name: CNB Financial Corporation
description: CNB Financial Corporation is a financial services holding company based in Pennsylvania, primarily engaged in providing a range of banking services through its subsidiary, CNB Bank. Established in 1865, the company has built a strong reputation for its commitment to customer service and community involvement. CNB Bank offers a comprehensive suite of financial products, including personal and commercial banking, mortgages, and investment services. With a focus on fostering relationships, CNB aims to support both individual and business clients in achieving their financial goals. The bank operates multiple branches throughout Pennsylvania and Ohio, ensuring accessibility to a wide customer base. In addition to traditional banking services, CNB Financial Corporation emphasizes digital banking solutions, providing customers with convenient online and mobile banking options. The company is dedicated to enhancing the financial well-being of the communities it serves, engaging in local events and initiatives that promote economic development. As a publicly traded company, CNB Financial Corporation is committed to transparency and shareholder value, continually striving to improve its financial performance and market position. The organization is focused on responsible growth, innovative banking solutions, and maintaining strong relationships with its customers and communities.

seo.meta_title: CNB Financial Corporation | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore CNB Financial Corporation, a community-focused bank providing a range of financial services, including personal and commercial banking, mortgages, and digital banking solutions.

faq.question: What services does CNB Financial Corporation offer?
faq.answer: CNB Financial Corporation offers personal and commercial banking, mortgages, investment services, and digital banking solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of CNB Financial Corporation?
faq.answer: Joseph B. Bower is the CEO of CNB Financial Corporation.

faq.question: Where is CNB Financial Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: CNB Financial Corporation is headquartered in Clearfield, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: When was CNB Financial Corporation founded?
faq.answer: CNB Financial Corporation was founded in 1865.
